LanguageData.VehicleRaidsEnabledTooltip: Raids using Vehicles will be allowed to use this vehicle if points and tech level allow for it.
LanguageData.VehicleNavigationTypeTooltip: Navigation category for the World Map. Dictates when the Vehicle may move on the World Map.
LanguageData.VehicleNameableTooltip: Allow naming of this vehicle. Name will appear over the vehicle and will replace the displayed label.
LanguageData.VehicleCombatPowerTooltip: Combat points vehicle costs in order to generate in an event.
LanguageData.VehicleCanCaravanTooltip: Vehicle is able to be taken on caravans.
LanguageData.VF_DisabledSingleModDependencyTooltip: Disabled. Compatible mod not in active mod list: {0}
LanguageData.VF_DisabledMultipleModsDependencyTooltip: Disabled. Compatible mods not in active mod list: {0}
LanguageData.VF_SaveableFieldLockedTooltip: Setting is locked for this Vehicle.
LanguageData.VF_DebugDisabledTooltip: Disabled for all Vehicles at this time.
LanguageData.VehicleVisibilityWorldMapTooltip: Visibility on the world map when traveling in a caravan.
LanguageData.VehicleWinterSpeedMultiplierTooltip: Additional cost for traveling during winter.
LanguageData.VehicleWorldSpeedMultiplierTooltip: Multiplier to MoveSpeed when on the world map in a caravan.
LanguageData.VF_FuelConsumptionWorldTooltip: Fule consumption multiplier on the world map.
LanguageData.VehicleReconDistanceTooltip: Distance in tiles the shuttle will be able to perform recon of a site or settlement.
LanguageData.VF_ControlInFlightTooltip: Control the aerial vehicle while it is in flight. Allows for changing of flight paths midflight, choosing your landing after loading a map, and strafing maps that have not yet been loaded.
LanguageData.VF_SpaceFlightTooltip: Vehicle is capable of launching to and taking off from space objects.
LanguageData.VehicleRateOfClimbTooltip: Amount the vehicle ascends per tick.
LanguageData.VehicleMaxAltitudeTooltip: Maximum altitude this vehicle can achieve when in flight.
LanguageData.VehicleMaxFallRateTooltip: Max amount this vehicle will descend when shot down or out of fuel.
LanguageData.VehicleFishingEnabledTooltip: Enables fishing when stationary over water.
LanguageData.ManhunterTargetsVehicleTooltip: Manhunter animals will target this vehicle.
